Package io.github.mrblobman.spigotcommandlib

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandHandler
    Used to link all command handlers.
    FragmentedCommandContextSupplier<T>
    Supplies the context manager with new context objects for use in FragmentedCommandHandler.
    FragmentedCommandHandler<T extends FragmentExecutionContext>
    Marks the class as a class that handles fragmented commands annotated with the FragmentedCommandHandle annotation.
    SubCommandHandler
    Used to mark this class as a class that contains SubCommandHandles.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FragmentExecutionContext
    Used to store state information that will be carried through fragment handlers.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CommandException
    Thrown when an exception is thrown during command execution.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CommandHandle
    Marks the annotated method as a method that should be registered as a command.
    FragmentedCommandHandle
    Marks this method as a fragment handler for a command that is executed in multiple parts.
    SubCommandHandle
    Marks the annotated method as a method that handles sub command executions.
